titleStmt.title: The Sanskrit Fragments Or.15010 in the Hoernle Collection
titleStmt.author: Karashima, Seishi

sourceDesc.p: Seishi Karashima, “The Sanskrit Fragments Or.15010 in the Hoernle Collection,” in: Buddhist Manuscripts from Central Asia: The British Library Sanskrit Fragments, Volume II.1 (Texts), ed. by Seishi KARASHIMA and Klaus WILLE, Tokyo: The International Research Institute for Advanced Buddhology at Soka University, 2009, pp. 335-550.

encodingDesc.editorialDecl: Input and marked up by IRIAB.

head.p: This catalogue contains transliterations of Sanskrit fragments in the Stein Collection at the British Library.

msItem.title: Anantamukhanirhāradhāraṇīsūtra
msItem.q:
1 sagārabhena sapra{{..}}deśena kṛtajñena bhavitavyaṃ kṛtavedināṃ gaṃbhīradharmakṣāntiprayukte-
2 na bhavitavyaṃ anutpādadharmapratyavekṣakena saṃvibhāgakuśalena bhavitavyaṃ kim āpriyāto
3 (’)pi kim āparittato : imasmiṃ kho puna dharmaparyyāye bhagavato bhāṣamānaṃ … dvātrīṃ-
4 śehi gaṃganadivālikasamehi bodhisatvehi ayaṃ dhāraṇipratilabdhā avaivartti-
5 kā ca-m-abhūṣi anutta○rāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāyāṃ ṣaṣṭehiṃ ca biṃbarehi anutpatti-
6 keṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipra{[ti]}labdhāḥ dvātrīṃśehiṃ ca sahasrehi dīvyamānuṣyikāyaṃ prajā-
7 yā[ṃ] anutta[[ra]]yāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāyāṃ cittam utpanna {{..}} ayaṃ ca tṛsahasramahāsaha
8 sralokadhātu ṣaḍvi{{kha}}kāra prakaṃpitāḥ divyaṃ ca puṣpavarṣam abhipravarṣitā aghaṭitaṃ ca tu-
9 (rya)śatasahasra pravājitā … atha khu āyuṣmāṃ śāriputro bhagavantam etad avoca{[t]}* … ko nā-

1 + + + [d]. (bha)[gavā] ayaṃ dharmapa(r)yy(ā)ya[ṃ] katha(ṃ) ca nāma dhāremu bhagavāṃn āha … tasmā ta-
2 rhi śāriputra ayaṃ dharmaparyyāyaṃ anantamukhanirhāran ti nāma dhārehi … ekāṃśi
3 yathāyaṃ bodhi-āharitrakan ti {{..}} nāma dhārehi : ekāṃśi yathāyaṃ sarvvajña{[tā]}pratilā-
4 bhaṃ ti nāma dhārehi : idam avaci bhagavāṃ āttamano āyuṣmāṃ śāriputro te ca daśadi-
5 śalokadhātusaṃni○paditā bodhisatvā sā ca sarvvāvanta pariṣā sadevagandharvvamānu-
6 ṣāsuraś ca loko bhagavata bhāṣitum abhinandiṣu ||

msItem.title: Śārdūlakarṇāvadāna
msItem.q:
1 te sāyaṃ ca sāyamāśarthaṃ prāta[ṃ] ca prātaraśarthaṃ grāma piṇḍāyām avatarati ・ atha khalu teṣā satvānām eta-
2 d abhavat* ime khalu satvā [v]ai [d]uṣkarasya kārakā ime parigraharogā ・ parigrahagaṇḍā parigrahaśalyā
3 pari{[gra]}hāṃ [[hi]]tvāraṇy[[āy]]atanāni gatvā ○ śākhāparṇapalāśānāṃ parṇakuṭikāṃ māpayitvā dhyāya[[ṃ]]ti ・ te sāyaṃ
4 ca sāyamāśārthaṃ p[r]ā[t]aṃ ca prāta○rāśārthaṃ grāmaṃ piṇḍāyāvataranti ・ teṣāṃ satvānām atīva dātavyaṃ kartavya
5 manyanti ・ iti .. + + + + .. nā iti sā saṃjñā udupādi ・ atha khalu tadanyatarāḥ satvā vividhāni
6 rājasaṃpray. + + + + + + + + .[ā]payanti (・) vividhāni rā[j]asaṃprayuktāni karmāntāni kārāpaya-

1 ntīti : vaiśyā [i] + + + + + + + + di ・ atha khalu ta[[da]]nyatarā kṣudreṇa karmaṇā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti
2 i{[ti]} kṣudrā ・ śudrā [i] + + .. + .. udupādi ・ abhū pūrvvaṃ brāhmaṇānyatarāyā vaddhyo (’)nyatarasmiṃ mata-
3 ṅgaraṇyeyaṃ vahyamānāyāṃ ○ akṣo bhagno mahāṅga bhagnā mātāṅ[g]a bhagnā mātaṅga iti sā saṃjñā loke
4 udupādi ・ kṣetraṃ kṛṣanti karṣa○kā iti sā saṃjño loke udupādi ・ vaṇikpathena jīvikā kalpaya-
5 nti vaṇijo iti sā saṃjñā lokai udapādi [[・]] dharmeṇa parṣadaṃ rañjayanti śīlavṛttasamācāro rājo iti
6 sā saṃjño loke udupādi ・ pariv[r]ajati pravrajitā iti saṃjñā loke udupādi [[・]] api tu brāhmaṇa etad e
